name: Five Nights At Nightmares Chapter 2
description: After David Escaped The Nightmare Pizzeria He Told Everything To The Manager And The Pizzeria Got Closed Again And After 7 Months The Animatronics Became Broken But They Escaped The Pizzeria And They Found Where David Lives And Now The Animatronics Stay On Street And They Pretend That They Dont Work After David Saw Them On The Streets He Knew That They're Still Alive So Now Every Night He Will Try To Protect His Self From The Animatronics
